Package rekit.core

Enum Team

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Team>
rekit.core.Team
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Team>, java.lang.constant.Constable
public enum Team
extends java.lang.Enum<Team>
This enum defines all different teams and their relationships.
Author:
Dominik Fuchss
